name: News InShorts
description: News InShorts scrapes news from different news websites and provides summarized version of the news using extractive summarization

name: Issue Tracker
description: Issue Tracker is a simple issue tracking system that allows users to create, view, and manage issues. It is built Remix, Prisma, and PostgreSQL.
